mainHero.title: Tekeleza
mainHero.subtitle: Monitoring Water, Sustaining Life ðŸ’§
mainHero.description: Tekeleza is a smart water monitoring app that empowers communities with real-time insights into water flow, water quality, and distribution, ensuring efficient management of water resources and a sustainable future.

items.title: For Water Authorities: Optimize Water Management and Efficiency
items.description: Tekeleza empowers water authorities with real-time monitoring tools to quickly identify and address leaks, inefficiencies, and contaminants, enhancing predictive maintenance and ensuring water quality. The app improves operational efficiency and reliability in water supply through advanced sensors, machine learning, and comprehensive reporting.

items.title: For Households: Empowering Consumers with Water Insights
items.description: Tekeleza provides households with valuable insights into their water usage, sends alerts about potential shortages in their area, and helps them locate nearby alternative water sources, ensuring they stay informed and prepared.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: Technology for Social Good
features.description: Tekeleza leverages the power of the Internet of Things such as sensors which are installed within the water distribution pipeline for real-time water resource monitoring, of metrics such as flow rate and water quality, thus enabling prompt responses and actions by water managers and authorities.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
